data.name: XItemList
desc: provides convenient access to the list of items in a list box

methods.name: addItemListListener
desc: registers a listener which is notified about changes in the item list.

methods.name: getAllItems
desc: retrieves the texts and images of all items in the list

methods.name: getItemData
desc: retrieves the implementation dependent value associated with the given list item.

methods.name: getItemImage
desc: retrieves the URL of the image of an existing item

methods.name: getItemText
desc: retrieves the text of an existing item

methods.name: getItemTextAndImage
desc: retrieves both the text and the image URL of an existing item

methods.name: insertItem
desc: inserts a new item into the list

methods.name: insertItemImage
desc: inserts an item which has only an image, but no text

methods.name: insertItemText
desc: inserts an item which has only a text, but no image

methods.name: removeAllItems
desc: removes all items from the list

methods.name: removeItem
desc: removes an item from the list

methods.name: removeItemListListener
desc: revokes a listener which is notified about changes in the item list.

methods.name: setItemData
desc: associates an implementation dependent value with the given list item.
You can use this to store data for an item which does not interfere with the displayed text and image, but can be used by the client of the list box for an arbitrary purpose.

methods.name: setItemImage
desc: sets a new image for an existing item

methods.name: setItemText
desc: sets a new text for an existing item

methods.name: setItemTextAndImage
desc: sets both a new position and text for an existing item

properties.name: ItemCount
desc: is the number of items in the list
